CO-MANAGER

SUMMARY

Seeking a management position that utilizes my strong experience and skills to achieve an organization's sales and profit goals Well — organized , detail-oriented individual who manages a high volume workload within a deadline driven environment Expertise in establishing priorities and coordinating work assignments to control and maximize productivity Skilled at working harmoniously with associates and resolving minor personnel problems Experience in staff performance evaluation and the creation/implementation of procedural changes to improve the quality of the workforce Outstanding customer service skills with focus on achieving top levels of customer satisfaction Skilled in use of MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point; bilingual in French and Creole

<JD_START>
Job Title: Auto Store Manager - Prenlyn Automotive Group

Location: Springfield, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Summit, NJ

Automotive Store Manager

Salary: $900 – $1,200 per week + Great Benefits!

Weekly and Monthly Performance-Based Bonuses

Store Manager Experience Preferred

At least 2 years of Service Experience Required

Prenlyn Automotive in Summit, NJ is now interviewing candidates for a Sales / Store Manager who will be responsible for every aspect of the store’s operation, which includes selecting, coaching and developing store teammates as well as merchandising, advertising and promotion of products and services. The Store Manager is the key component of running a successful shop. They are responsible for everything that happens within their four walls. 

If this sounds like you and you’re looking for a career instead

of a 9-5 clock in and out job then apply today!

Come see why Prenlyn is one of the largest and most successful

Franchises in the Midas system!

Why Prenlyn?

With over 45 years of success in the automotive repair business, we are dedicated to hiring great people. Our focus is our employees. We offer paid training, development and a great work/life balance to ensure our employees are driven and have a 'success' mindset and the tools they need to be the best.

Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/prenlynauto

Why Great People?

Great people are driven, do excellent work, and are great team players. We want people that foster an atmosphere of great customer service, great sales ability, and great administrative skills in a fast-paced environment. Great people are not afraid of change and are always willing to aid not only in their personal success but the successes of everyone around them.

We offer:

Salary: $900 - $1,200.00 per weekWeekly and monthly performance-based bonusesOpportunities for advancement within the company401(k) with matching contributionsHealth, Dental, Vision insuranceLife and short-term disability insuranceUp to 3 weeks’ paid vacationAll major holidays off and personal time offPaid weeklyFamily owned and operatedEmployee discountPaid trainingGreat work/life balance


Responsibilities – Sales / Store Manager:

Sales:

Build repair estimates based on technician’s recommendationsPresent options to the customer, overcoming objections as neededPrice jobs correctly and limit discounting to hit gross margins goalsAttain weekly, monthly and yearly targetsEnsure technicians are following all inspection & safety proceduresKeep shop payroll within company budgetDo whatever it takes to say “yes” to every customerOperationsOther duties as assigned


Bay management:

Source required parts for repair ordersEnsure the image of the staff, interior and exterior meet company standardAccounts receivable and payableInventory managementStaffing and schedule managementEnforce company policy and guidelinesManage technician training and development


Qualifications/Requirements – Sales / Store Manager:

Associate Degree preferredAt least 2 years of Automotive service, Sales and Customer service requiredExperience managing a team of 4 or more preferredProven ability in sales growthHave working knowledge of cars with the ability to aid and train technicians with repairs as needed. Build repair estimates based on technician’s recommendationsPresent options to the customer, overcoming objections and closing sales as neededEnsure technicians are following all inspection & safety proceduresDo whatever it takes to say “yes” to every customerHave the ability to source required parts for repair ordersHave the ability to manage technician training and developmentHave an ambitious mindset for successValid driver’s licenseReliably commute or plan to relocate before starting workPlease upload your resume and complete the online assessmentMust be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship and be a current resident. Must pass pre-employment testing to include background checks, MVR, and drug screening. 


About us:

Prenlyn is considered to be one of the most well-respected Midas Franchises in the system. We have been recognized as the Franchisee of the year multiple times and have been operating for over 45 years.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants considered regardless of ethnicity, nationality, gender, veteran or disability status, religion, age, gender orientation or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
